title: HAP 64 - God is a Negro - Henry McNeal Turner
itunes:title: HAP 64 - God is a Negro - Henry McNeal Turner
description: A late 19th-century churchman tries to explain how slavery fit into God’s plan, and decide whether the future for African-Americans lies in Africa or America.
content:encoded: A late 19th-century churchman tries to explain how slavery fit into God’s plan, and decide whether the future for African-Americans lies in Africa or America.
itunes:subtitle: A late 19th-century churchman tries to explain how slavery fit into God’s plan, and decide whether the future for African-Americans lies in Africa or America.
itunes:summary: A late 19th-century churchman tries to explain how slavery fit into God’s plan, and decide whether the future for African-Americans lies in Africa or America.
itunes:author: Peter Adamson, Jonardon Ganeri, Chike Jeffers
